title: ANN: typism - web-based font editor
content:
Dear all,

With my heart filled with joy I write to tell you that I finally launched the font editor!

More at [http://typism.appspot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203145004/http:/typism.appspot.com/)

Juraj Sukop

PS: If you see some errors or nothing at all, probably the first thing to check out is [http://code.google.com/p/typism/issues/detail?id=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203145004/http:/code.google.com/p/typism/issues/detail?id=1)
author: Juraj Sukop
